title: Ciphertext Challenge III - Fast Level 1
description: I definitely took some code (how to match decoded and plain strings) from https://www.kaggle.com/tarobxl/cipher-challenge-iii-level-2, and changed to improve performance (Thanks to the awesome flashtext library) Decoding itself comes from my previos Kernel: https://www.kaggle.com/elvenmonk/difficulty-1-reverse-engineering-no-ml I hope it can be useful to speedup cracking next Difficulty levels!
